articles.title: Yida Wang
articles.contents:
My name is Yida Wang, and welcome to my website. I enjoy a wide array of hobbies from BJJ to chess, and from video games to binging documentaries so Iâ€™ll pretty much write anything and everything.
I am very passionate about social policies and, in particular, criminal justice related discussions. Feel free to reach out using any of the links above and thank you for visiting!
Education:
University of Pennsylvania 2016 MS Criminology (concentration in policy)
University of Toronto 2015 Hons BA Sociology & Criminology
